test-set.name: prod-DirAttributeList
test-set.description: Tests for the DirAttributeList production (the list of attributes in a direct element constructor)

test-case.name: Constr-attr-syntax-1
test-case.description: Single attribute

test-case.name: Constr-attr-syntax-2
test-case.description: Multiple attributes

test-case.description: Single quotes for attribute

test-case.description: Escaped single quote

test-case.description: Escaped double quote

test-case.description: Mismatched quotes

test-case.description: Mismatched quotes

test-case.description: Attribute parent element

test-case.description: namespace declaration does not count as attribute

test-case.description: namespace default declaration does not count as attribute

test-case.description: attribute prefix declared in prolog

test-case.description: attribute prefix declared in parent element

test-case.description: attribute prefix declared in same element after

test-case.description: namespace prefix used in content before it is declared

test-case.name: Constr-attr-nsprein-4
test-case.description: namespace prefix used deeply nested in content before it is declared

test-case.description: attributes with identical local names

test-case.description: attributes with identical local names

test-case.description: attributes with identical local names

test-case.description: attributes with identical local name and URI

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemAttr-40
test-case.description: Attributes with many apostrophes and quotes.
test-case.test: <elem attr1="""" attr2='''' attr3="''" attr4='""' attr5="'" attr6='"'/>

result.assert-xml: <elem attr1=""" attr2="'" attr3="''" attr4="""" attr5="'" attr6="""/>

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemAttr-68
test-case.description: Use two namespace declarations with the same name.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemAttr-70
test-case.description: Ensure that attributes constructed with direct constructors doesn't pick up the default namespace.
test-case.test: declare default element namespace "http://typedecl"; namespace-uri-from-QName(node-name(exactly-one(<e attr="foo"/>/@attr))) eq ""

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemAttr-71
test-case.description: Ensure that attributes constructed with computed constructors doesn't pick up the default namespace.
test-case.test: declare default element namespace "http://typedecl"; namespace-uri-from-QName(node-name(exactly-one(<e>{attribute attr {()} }/</e>/@attr))) eq ""

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemAttr-72
test-case.description: Ensure that attributes constructed with computed constructors doesn't pick up the default namespace.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemAttr-73
test-case.description: Ensure that attributes constructed with computed constructors doesn't pick up the default namespace(#2).
test-case.test: declare default element namespace "http://example.com/"; namespace-uri-from-QName(node-name(attribute e {()})) eq ""

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemAttr-74
test-case.description: Check that character references next to embedded expressions are parsed correctly.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemAttr-75
test-case.description: Mix several ways for creating text for various kinds of nodes. This test is useful if an implementation is performing normalization of such constructors.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElemAttr-76
test-case.description: Pass text nodes through a function and variable, into AVTs.
